title: Fox - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Mature   Romance   Xuanhuan   Yaoi
tags: Ancient Times   Caring Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Demon Lord   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Early Romance   Fairies   Fantasy World   Fated Lovers   Fox Spirits   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Immortals   Reincarnation   Second Chance
author: 扶风琉璃
description:
The nine-tailed fox king Bai Li fell in love with the scholar You Qing, giving up his nine foxtails and chasing him across nine lives. He spent a thousand years chasing him but never caught up, only because he was always one step behind. On the brink of despair, he was reborn, back to their first ever meeting, where everything had not yet begun. This time, the Fox King will definitely catch up! Definitely pursue the scholar successfully!

Attendant: “Fox King, he is a man. How can he be your queen consort?”

Fox King: “Then he can be my prince consort!”

Attendant: “…”>
